verses.verse: (A Psalm of Asaph.) O God, <WH430> the nations <WH1471> have invaded <WH935> Thine inheritance; <WH5159> They have defiled <WH2930> Thy holy <WH6944> temple; <WH1964> They have laid <WH7760> Jerusalem <WH3389> in ruins. <WH5856>

They have given <WH5414> the dead <WH5038> bodies <WH5038> of Thy servants <WH5650> for food <WH3978> to the birds <WH5775> of the heavens, <WH8064> The flesh <WH1320> of Thy godly <WH2623> ones <WH2623> to the beasts <WH9130> of the earth. <WH776>
They have poured <WH8210> out their blood <WH1818> like water <WH4325> round <WH5439> about <WH5439> Jerusalem; <WH3389> And there <WH369> was no <WH369> one <WH369> to bury <WH6912> them.
We have <WH1961> become <WH1961> a reproach <WH2781> to our neighbors, <WH7934> A scoffing <WH3933> and derision <WH7047> to those around <WH5439> us.
How <WH4100> long, <WH5704> O Lord <WH3068>? Wilt Thou be angry <WH599> forever <WH5331>? Will Thy jealousy <WH7068> burn <WH1197> like <WH3644> fire <WH784>?
Pour <WH8210> out Thy wrath <WH2534> upon the nations <WH1471> which <WH834> do not know <WH3045> Thee, And upon the kingdoms <WH4467> which <WH834> do not call <WH7121> upon Thy name. <WH8034>
For they have devoured <WH398> Jacob, <WH3290> And laid <WH8074> waste <WH8074> his habitation. <WH5116>

Do not remember <WH2142> the iniquities <WH5771> of [our] forefathers <WH7223> against us; Let Thy compassion <WH7356> come <WH6923> quickly <WH4118> to meet <WH6923> us; For we are brought <WH1809> very <WH3966> low. <WH1809>
Help <WH5826> us, O God <WH430> of our salvation, <WH3468> for the glory <WH9202> of Thy name; <WH8034> And deliver <WH5337> us, and forgive <WH3722> our sins, <WH9128> for Thy name's sake. <WH4616>

Why <WH4100> should the nations <WH1471> say, <WH559> "Where <WH346> is their God <WH430>?" Let there be known <WH3045> among the nations <WH1471> in our sight, <WH5869> Vengeance <WH5360> for the blood <WH1818> of Thy servants, <WH5650> which has been shed. <WH8210>

Let the groaning <WH603> of the prisoner <WH615> come <WH935> before <WH6440> Thee; According to the greatness <WH1433> of Thy power <WH2220> preserve <WH3498> those <WH1121> who <WH1121> are doomed <WH1121> to die. <WH8546>
And return <WH7725> to our neighbors <WH7934> sevenfold <WH7659> into their bosom <WH2436> The reproach <WH2781> with which <WH834> they have reproached <WH2778> Thee, O Lord. <WH136>

So we Thy people <WH5971> and the sheep <WH6629> of Thy pasture <WH4830> Will give <WH3034> thanks <WH3034> to Thee forever; <WH5769> To all <WH1755> generations <WH1755> we will tell <WH5608> of Thy praise. <WH8416>
